page.title: 30A Day in the Life of Jackson
page.content:
I awake at 6:30am and watch tv. Then I eat my breakfast, wash, put my uniform on and at 8.50am walk to school. When I get there I talk to my friends, register on the Smartboard, order lunch and read a book before doing maths until break and project until lunch. After eating my baguette and fruit, I play on the trim trail. We then do literacy and at 3.00pm I go home and get changed. I go out to play then watch tv until I have my dinner of pizza, ice-cream and juice. Then I watch tv before bed.




Milesmark Primary School
